Title: BGLR: Bayesian Generalized Linear Regression
Abstract: The BGLR (‘Bayesian Generalized Linear Regression’) function fits various types of parametric and semi-parametric Bayesian regressions to continuos (censored or not), binary and ordinal outcomes
Tags: Bayesian statistics; generalized linear regression; parametric regression; semi-parametric regression; continuous outcomes; binary outcomes; ordinal outcomes; BGLR function
